/**
 * Get your WebSocket Server running in the cloud for free â€“ code, deploy, connect!
 * Or you can also deploy autogenerated ChatGPT Node.js code like below
 */

// Use axios to fetch data from a fake API endpoint
const response = await axios.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1')
const todo = response.data

// Use moment to format the current date
const formattedDate = moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss')

// Use lodash to pick certain properties from the todo item
const pickedTodo = _.pick(todo, ['id', 'title'])

// Use jsonwebtoken to create a token
const token = jwt.sign(pickedTodo, 'my_secret_key', { expiresIn: '1h' })

// Use uuid to generate a unique identifier
const uuid = uuidv4()

// Output the processed data
console.error(`shuffledArray: ${_.shuffle([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6])}`)    // Outputs: [4, 1, 6, 3, 5, 2] (example output)
console.warn(`Picked Todo: ${JSON.stringify(pickedTodo, null, 2)}`)
console.info(`Formatted Date: ${formattedDate}`)
console.debug(`JWT Token: ${token}`)
console.log(`UUID: ${uuid}`)
